arts.ttl: Wayne Rooney makes telling admission as Plymouth fans call for him to be sacked
arts.sum: Wayne Rooney is on the brink of being sacked as Plymouth Argyle manager after another dispiriting away day saw his side beaten 2-0 by fellow Championship strugglers Oxford

arts.ttl: Wayne Rooney's Plymouth crisis hits embarrassing new low as he's branded 'clueless'
arts.sum: Wayne Rooney is under increasing pressure at Plymouth Argyle following their 2-0 defeat to Oxford United, with the club rooted to the bottom of the Championship

arts.ttl: Rooney's Plymouth beaten again at Oxford
arts.sum: Ciaron Brown and Przemyslaw Placheta both scored for the second game running to help Gary Rowett make it two wins from two as Oxford's new boss with a 2-0 victory over Championship's bottom club Plymouth.

arts.ttl: Ciaron Brown and Przemyslaw Placheta score as Oxford win again under Gary Rowett
arts.sum: This was an 11th defeat in 13 games on the road for Argyle’s under-pressure manager Wayne Rooney.

arts.ttl: UPDATES: Oxford United v Plymouth Argyle – live
arts.sum: All the build-up, action and reaction as Oxford United welcome Sky Bet Championship side Plymouth Argyle. Gary Rowett made a winning start as U’s head coach with a 3-2 victory against Cardiff City on Boxing Day. Oxford United (20th) v Plymouth Argyle (24th) Comment below or tweet @OxfordMailOUFC to get involved.

arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Championship clash between Oxford United and Plymouth Argyle, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Wayne Rooney sent message by Frank Lampard after setting unwanted 20-year record
arts.sum: Wayne Rooney's Plymouth are bottom of the Championship with the worst defensive record in two decades but Frank Lampard is backing his former team-mate to come good

arts.ttl: 'Oh no': Jarrod Bowen picks who he thinks was better - Thierry Henry or Wayne Rooney
